title: BRIEF-Zenith Energy Says Deepening Of Well C-37 Identified 3 Untapped Oil-Bearing Clastic Layers
text:
BRIEF-Zenith Energy Says Deepening Of Well C-37 Identified 3 Untapped Oil-Bearing Clastic Layers

Stock Markets 45 minutes ago (Sep 09, 2019 04:00)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Zenith Energy Says Deepening Of Well C-37 Identified 3 Untapped Oil-Bearing Clastic Layers Sept 9 (Reuters) - Zenith Energy Ltd : * ZENITH ENERGY LTD - UPDATES REGARDING DRILLING OPERATIONS AT WELL C-37 IN JAFARLI OILFIELD. * ZENITH ENERGY - DEEPENING OF WELL C-37 IN JAFARLI OILFIELD SUCCESSFULLY IDENTIFIED 3 UNTAPPED OIL-BEARING CLASTIC LAYERS IN MIDDLE EOCENE FORMATION
